arabicText: وَإِذْ قَالَتْ أُمَّةٌۭ مِّنْهُمْ لِمَ تَعِظُونَ قَوْمًا ۙ ٱللَّهُ مُهْلِكُهُمْ أَوْ مُعَذِّبُهُمْ عَذَابًۭا شَدِيدًۭا ۖ قَالُوا۟ مَعْذِرَةً إِلَىٰ رَبِّكُمْ وَلَعَلَّهُمْ يَتَّقُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	when	a	group	among	them	said,	“Why	
do	 you	preach	 to	a	people	whom	Allah is	
going	 to	 destroy	 or	 mete	 out	 a	 severe	
punishment?”	 They	 said,	 “To	 have	 an	
excuse	before	your	Lord, and	that	perhaps	
they	may	fear.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	jab	un	meiñ	se	ek	giroh	ne	kahā	kyuñ		
nasihat	karte	ho	un	logoñ	ko	jinheiñ	Allah	
halāk	karne	wāla	hai	ya	unheiñ		sakht	‘aƶāb		
dene	 wāla	 bole	 tumhāre	 Rab	 ke	 huzoor	
m’āzirat	ko	aur	shayad	unheiñ		dar	ho

arabicText: فَلَمَّا نَسُوا۟ مَا ذُكِّرُوا۟ بِهِۦٓ أَنجَيْنَا ٱلَّذِينَ يَنْهَوْنَ عَنِ ٱلسُّوٓءِ وَأَخَذْنَا ٱلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوا۟ بِعَذَابٍۭ بَـِٔيسٍۭ بِمَا كَانُوا۟ يَفْسُقُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	when	they	forgot	the	advices	they	had	
been	given,	We	rescued	those	who	forbade	
evil,	and	seized	the	unjust	with	a	dreadful	
punishment	 - the	 recompense	 of	 their	
disobedience.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Phir	 jab	 woh	 bhula	 baithe	 jo	 nasihat	
unheiñ		huyi	thi	hum	ne	bacha	liye	wah	jo	
burāyi	se	mana’	karte	they	aur	Ƶālimoñ	ko	
bure	 ‘aƶāb	 meiñ	 pakda	 badla	 unki	 nafarmāni	ka

arabicText: فَلَمَّا عَتَوْا۟ عَن مَّا نُهُوا۟ عَنْهُ قُلْنَا لَهُمْ كُونُوا۟ قِرَدَةً خَـٰسِـِٔينَ
englishTranslationText:
Consequently	when	 they	 rebelled	 against	
the	command	to	refrain,	We	said	to	them,	
“Be	apes,	despised!”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Phir	jab	unhoñ	ne	mumani'at	ke	ḥukm		se	
sarkashi	 ki	 hum	 ne	 un	 se farmaya	 ho	jāo	
bandar	dutkāre	(dhutkāre)	huwe

arabicText: وَإِذْ تَأَذَّنَ رَبُّكَ لَيَبْعَثَنَّ عَلَيْهِمْ إِلَىٰ يَوْمِ ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ مَن يَسُومُهُمْ سُوٓءَ ٱلْعَذَابِ ۗ إِنَّ رَبَّكَ لَسَرِيعُ ٱلْعِقَابِ ۖ وَإِنَّهُۥ لَغَفُورٌۭ رَّحِيمٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
And	 remember	 when	 your	 Lord	
announced	the	command	that	till	the	Day	
of	Resurrection	 I	will	certainly	send	such	
oppressors	 against	 them,	 who	 will	 inflict	
them	with	a	dreadful	punishment;	indeed	
your	 Lord	 is	 swift	 in	 meting	 out	
punishment;	 and	 indeed	 He	 is	 Oft	
Forgiving,	Most	Merciful.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	jab	tumhāre	Rab	ne	ḥukm		suna	diya	
ke	zaroor	qiyamat	ke	din	tak	un	par	aise	ko	
bhejta	 rahooñga	 jo	 unheiñ	 	 buri	 mār	
chakhaye	be-shak	tumhāra	Rab	zaroor	jald	
‘aƶāb		wāla	hai	aur	be-shak	woh	bakhsh	ne	
wāla	maherbān	hai

arabicText: وَقَطَّعْنَـٰهُمْ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ أُمَمًۭا ۖ مِّنْهُمُ ٱلصَّـٰلِحُونَ وَمِنْهُمْ دُونَ ذَٰلِكَ ۖ وَبَلَوْنَـٰهُم بِٱلْحَسَنَـٰتِ وَٱلسَّيِّـَٔاتِ لَعَلَّهُمْ يَرْجِعُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	 We	 divided	 them	 in	 the	 earth	 as	
separate	 groups;	 some	 of	 them	 are	
righteous	and	some	are	the	other	type;	and	
We	 tested	 them	 with	 good	(favours)	 and	
evil	 things	(adversities)	 so	 that	 they	 may	
return.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	 unheiñ	 hum	 ne	 zameen	 meiñ	
mutafarriq	 kar	 diya	 giroh	 giroh	 un	 meiñ	
kuchh	nek	haiñ	aur	kuchh	aur	tarah	ke	aur	
hum	ne	unheiñ		bhalaiyoñ	aur	buraiyoñ	se	
āazmāya	ke	kahiñ	woh	ruju'	lāayeñ

arabicText: فَخَلَفَ مِنۢ بَعْدِهِمْ خَلْفٌۭ وَرِثُوا۟ ٱلْكِتَـٰبَ يَأْخُذُونَ عَرَضَ هَـٰذَا ٱلْأَدْنَىٰ وَيَقُولُونَ سَيُغْفَرُ لَنَا وَإِن يَأْتِهِمْ عَرَضٌۭ مِّثْلُهُۥ يَأْخُذُوهُ ۚ أَلَمْ يُؤْخَذْ عَلَيْهِم مِّيثَـٰقُ ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ أَن لَّا يَقُولُوا۟ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ إِلَّا ٱلْحَقَّ وَدَرَسُوا۟ مَا فِيهِ ۗ وَٱلدَّارُ ٱلْـَٔاخِرَةُ خَيْرٌۭ لِّلَّذِينَ يَتَّقُونَ ۗ أَفَلَا تَعْقِلُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	after	them	in	their	place,	came	those	unworthy	successors	who	inherited	the	Books	- they	
accept	 the	goods	of	 this	world	(as	bribes)	and	say,	 “We	shall	soon	be	 forgiven”;	and	if	similar	
goods	come	to	them	again,	they	would	accept	it;	was	not	the	covenant	taken	from	them	in	the	
Book,	that	they	must	not	relate	anything	to	Allah except	the	truth,	and	they	have	studied	it?	And	
indeed	the	abode	of	the	Hereafter	is	better	for	the	pious;	so	do	you	not	have	sense?
romanUrduTranslationText:
And	after	them	in	their	place,	came	those	unworthy	successors	who	inherited	the	Books	- they	
accept	 the	goods	of	 this	world	(as	bribes)	and	say,	 “We	shall	soon	be	 forgiven”;	and	if	similar	
goods	come	to	them	again,	they	would	accept	it;	was	not	the	covenant	taken	from	them	in	the	
Book,	that	they	must	not	relate	anything	to	Allah except	the	truth,	and	they	have	studied	it?	And	
indeed	the	abode	of	the	Hereafter	is	better	for	the	pious;	so	do	you	not	have	sense?

arabicText: وَٱلَّذِينَ يُمَسِّكُونَ بِٱلْكِتَـٰبِ وَأَقَامُوا۟ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ إِنَّا لَا نُضِيعُ أَجْرَ ٱلْمُصْلِحِينَ
englishTranslationText:
And	those	who	hold	fast	to	the	Book,	and	have	kept	the	prayer	established;	and	We	do	not	waste	
the	wages	of	the	righteous.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	woh	jo	kitāb	ko	mazboot	thāmte	haiñ	aur	unhoñ	ne	Namāz	qāim	rakhi	aur	hum	nekoñ	ka	neg	
(Sawab)	nahi	gawāñte	(zāye	nahi	kartey).

arabicText: ۞ وَإِذْ نَتَقْنَا ٱلْجَبَلَ فَوْقَهُمْ كَأَنَّهُۥ ظُلَّةٌۭ وَظَنُّوٓا۟ أَنَّهُۥ وَاقِعٌۢ بِهِمْ خُذُوا۟ مَآ ءَاتَيْنَـٰكُم بِقُوَّةٍۢ وَٱذْكُرُوا۟ مَا فِيهِ لَعَلَّكُمْ تَتَّقُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	 when	 We	 raised	 the	 Mount	 (Sinai)	
above	them	as	if	it	were	a	canopy,	and	they	
thought	 that	 it	 would	 fall	 upon	 them;	
“Accept	 firmly	 what	 We	 have	 given	 you,	
and	 remember	 what	 is	 in	 it,	 so	 that	 you	
may	become	pious.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	jab	hum	ne	pahād	un	par	uthaya	goya	
woh	sayebān	hai	aur	samjhe	ke	woh	un	par	
gir	pade	ga	lo	jo	hum	ne	tumheiñ	diya	zor	
se	aur	yād	karo	jo	us	meiñ	hai	ke	kahiñ	tum	
parhez-gār	ho.

arabicText: وَإِذْ أَخَذَ رَبُّكَ مِنۢ بَنِىٓ ءَادَمَ مِن ظُهُورِهِمْ ذُرِّيَّتَهُمْ وَأَشْهَدَهُمْ عَلَىٰٓ أَنفُسِهِمْ أَلَسْتُ بِرَبِّكُمْ ۖ قَالُوا۟ بَلَىٰ ۛ شَهِدْنَآ ۛ أَن تَقُولُوا۟ يَوْمَ ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ إِنَّا كُنَّا عَنْ هَـٰذَا غَـٰفِلِينَ
englishTranslationText:
And	 remember	 when	 your	 Lord	 brought	
forth	the	generations	from	the	backs	of	the	
Descendants	 of	 Adam,	 and	 made	 them	
their	own	witness;	“Am	I	not	your	Lord?”;	
they	all	said,	“Yes	surely	You	are,	why	not?	
We	testify”;	for	you	may	say	on	the	Day	of	
Resurrection	 that,	 “We	 were	 unaware	 of	
this.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	 aey	Mehboob' Yād karo	 jab	 tumhāre	
Rab	ne	aulād-e-Ādam	ki	pusht	se	unki	nasl	
nikāli	aur	unheiñ		khud	un	par	gawah	kiya,	
kya	 maiñ	 tumhāra	 Rab	 nahi	 ?	 sab	 bole	
kyuñ	 	 nahi,	 hum	 gawah	 huwe	 ke	 kahiñ	
Qiyamat	ke	din	kaho	ke	hameiñ	iski	khabar	
na	thi

arabicText: أَوْ تَقُولُوٓا۟ إِنَّمَآ أَشْرَكَ ءَابَآؤُنَا مِن قَبْلُ وَكُنَّا ذُرِّيَّةًۭ مِّنۢ بَعْدِهِمْ ۖ أَفَتُهْلِكُنَا بِمَا فَعَلَ ٱلْمُبْطِلُونَ
englishTranslationText:
Or you	may	 say,	 “It	is	 our	ancestors	who	
first	 ascribed	 partners	(to	 Allah)	 and	 we	
were	 (their)	 children	 after	 them;	 so	 will	
You	destroy	us	on	account	of	the	deeds	of	
the	followers	of	falsehood?”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Ya	kaho	ke	shirk	to	pehle	hamāre	bāp	dāda	
ne	kiya	aur	hum	un	ke	b’ad	bachche	huwe	
to	kya	tu	hameiñ	us	par	halāk	farmaye	ga	
jo	ahle	bātil	ne	kiya

arabicText: وَكَذَٰلِكَ نُفَصِّلُ ٱلْـَٔايَـٰتِ وَلَعَلَّهُمْ يَرْجِعُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	 this	is	how	We	explain	 the	 verses	in	
different	 ways,	 and	 so	 that	 they	 may	
return.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	 hum	 isi	 tarah	 āayateiñ	 rang	 rang	
(Tafseel)	se	bayān	karte	haiñ	aur	is	liye	ke	
kahiñ	woh	phir	āayeñ

arabicText: وَٱتْلُ عَلَيْهِمْ نَبَأَ ٱلَّذِىٓ ءَاتَيْنَـٰهُ ءَايَـٰتِنَا فَٱنسَلَخَ مِنْهَا فَأَتْبَعَهُ ٱلشَّيْطَـٰنُ فَكَانَ مِنَ ٱلْغَاوِينَ
englishTranslationText:
And	 O	 dear	 Prophet	(Muhammad - peace	
and	blessings	be	upon	him)	recite	 to	 them	
the	case	of	the	one	to	whom	We	gave	Our	
revelations,	 and	 in	 response	 he	 departed	
from	them	completely	- so	Satan	went	after	
him	- he	therefore	became	of	the	astray.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	 aey	 Mehboob' Unheiñ	 uska	 ahwāl	
sunao	 jise	 hum	 ne	 apni	 āayateiñ	 deiñ	 to	
woh	 un	 se	 sāf	 nikal	 gaya	 to	 shaitān	 uske	
peechhe	laga	to	gumrahoñ	meiñ	ho	gaya.

arabicText: وَلَوْ شِئْنَا لَرَفَعْنَـٰهُ بِهَا وَلَـٰكِنَّهُۥٓ أَخْلَدَ إِلَى ٱلْأَرْضِ وَٱتَّبَعَ هَوَىٰهُ ۚ فَمَثَلُهُۥ كَمَثَلِ ٱلْكَلْبِ إِن تَحْمِلْ عَلَيْهِ يَلْهَثْ أَوْ تَتْرُكْهُ يَلْهَث ۚ ذَّٰلِكَ مَثَلُ ٱلْقَوْمِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَذَّبُوا۟ بِـَٔايَـٰتِنَا ۚ فَٱقْصُصِ ٱلْقَصَصَ لَعَلَّهُمْ يَتَفَكَّرُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	had	We	willed	We	could	have	raised	him	because	of	the	revelations,	but	he	clung	to	the	earth	
and	followed	his	own	desires;	his	condition	therefore	is	like	that	of	a	dog;	if	you	attack	him	he	
hangs	out	his	tongue	and	if	you	leave	him	he	hangs	out	his	tongue;	this	is	the	state	of	the	people	
who	denied	Our	signs;	therefore	preach,	so	that	they	may	give	thought.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	hum	chāhte	to	āayatoñ	ke	sabab	usey	utha	lete	magar	woh	to	zameen	pakad	gaya	aur	apni	
khwahish	ka	tabe'	huwa	to	uska	hāl	kutte	ki	tarah hai	tu	us	par	hamla	kare	to	zabān	nikāle	aur	
chhod	de	to	zabān	nikāle	yeh	hāl	hai	unka	 Jinhoñ	ne	hamāri	āayateiñ	jhutlāyiñ	to	tum	nasihat	
sunao	ke	kahiñ	woh	dhiyān	kareiñ	.

arabicText: سَآءَ مَثَلًا ٱلْقَوْمُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَذَّبُوا۟ بِـَٔايَـٰتِنَا وَأَنفُسَهُمْ كَانُوا۟ يَظْلِمُونَ
englishTranslationText: What	an	evil	example	is	of	those	who	denied	Our	signs	and	used	to	wrong	only	their	own	souls.
romanUrduTranslationText: Kya	buri	kahāwat	hai	unki	Jinhoñ	ne	hamāri	āayateiñ	jhutlāyiñ	aur	apni	hi	jān	ka	bura	karte	they.

arabicText: مَن يَهْدِ ٱللَّهُ فَهُوَ ٱلْمُهْتَدِى ۖ وَمَن يُضْلِلْ فَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلْخَـٰسِرُونَ
englishTranslationText:
Whomever	Allah guides	- only	he	is	on	the	right	path;	and	whomever	He	sends	astray	- it	is	they	
who	are	the	losers.
romanUrduTranslationText: Jise	Allah	rāh	dikhaye	to	wohi	rāh	par	hai	aur	jise	gumrah	kare	to	wohi	nuqsān	meiñ	rahe.

arabicText: وَلَقَدْ ذَرَأْنَا لِجَهَنَّمَ كَثِيرًۭا مِّنَ ٱلْجِنِّ وَٱلْإِنسِ ۖ لَهُمْ قُلُوبٌۭ لَّا يَفْقَهُونَ بِهَا وَلَهُمْ أَعْيُنٌۭ لَّا يُبْصِرُونَ بِهَا وَلَهُمْ ءَاذَانٌۭ لَّا يَسْمَعُونَ بِهَآ ۚ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ كَٱلْأَنْعَـٰمِ بَلْ هُمْ أَضَلُّ ۚ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلْغَـٰفِلُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	 indeed	 We	 have	 created	 many	 jinns	
and	men	for	hell;	they	have	hearts	in	which	
their is	 no	 understanding;	 and	 the	 eyes	
they	do	not	see	with;	and	the	ears	they	do	
not	hear	with;	they	are	like	cattle	- in	fact	
more	 astray;	 it	 is	 they	 who	 are	 the	
neglectful.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	 be-shak	 hum	 ne	 jahannam	 ke	 liye	
paida	 kiye bahut	 jinn	 aur	 āadmi	 woh	 dil	
rakhte	haiñ	jin	meiñ	samajh	nahi	aur	woh	
āañkheiñ			jin	se	dekhte	nahi	aur	woh	kān	
jin	se	sunte	nahi	woh	chaupāyoñ	ki	tarah	
haiñ	 balke	 un	 se	 badh	 kar	 gumrah	 wohi	
ghaflat	meiñ	pade	haiñ

arabicText: وَلِلَّهِ ٱلْأَسْمَآءُ ٱلْحُسْنَىٰ فَٱدْعُوهُ بِهَا ۖ وَذَرُوا۟ ٱلَّذِينَ يُلْحِدُونَ فِىٓ أَسْمَـٰٓئِهِۦ ۚ سَيُجْزَوْنَ مَا كَانُوا۟ يَعْمَلُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	 for	Allah only	are	 the	best	names,	so	
invoke	 Him	 by	 them;	 and	 abandon	 those	
who depart	 from	 the	 truth	 regarding	His	
names;	 they	will	soon	receive	 the	reward	
of	their	deeds.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	Allah	hi	ke	haiñ	bahut	achchhe	Nām	to	
usey	un	se	pukāro	aur	unheiñ		chhod	do	jo	
uske	nāmoñ	meiñ	Haq	se	nikalte	haiñ	woh	
jald	apna	kiya	pāyeñ	ge.

arabicText: وَمِمَّنْ خَلَقْنَآ أُمَّةٌۭ يَهْدُونَ بِٱلْحَقِّ وَبِهِۦ يَعْدِلُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	 from	 Our	 creation	 is	 a	 group	 that	
shows	 the	 truth	 and	 establishes	 justice	
with	it.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	hamāre	banaye	huwoñ	meiñ	ek	giroh	
woh	hai	ke	haq	batayeiñ	aur	us	par	insāf	
kareiñ

arabicText: وَٱلَّذِينَ كَذَّبُوا۟ بِـَٔايَـٰتِنَا سَنَسْتَدْرِجُهُم مِّنْ حَيْثُ لَا يَعْلَمُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	those	who	denied	Our	signs	- We	shall	
soon	 steadily	 lead	 them	 towards the	
punishment,	 from	 the	 place	 they	will	 not	
know.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	 jinhoñ	 ne	 hamāri	 āayateiñ	 jhutlāyiñ	
jald	hum	unheiñ		āahista	āahista	‘aƶāb		ki	
taraf	le	jāyeñge	jahāñ	se	unheiñ		khabar	na	
hogi

arabicText: وَأُمْلِى لَهُمْ ۚ إِنَّ كَيْدِى مَتِينٌ
englishTranslationText:
And	 I	 will	 give	 them	 respite;	 indeed	 My	
secret	plan	is	extremely	solid.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	 maiñ	 unheiñ	 	 dheel	 dooñga	 be-shak	
meri	khufya	tadbeer	bahut	pakki	hai

arabicText: أَوَلَمْ يَتَفَكَّرُوا۟ ۗ مَا بِصَاحِبِهِم مِّن جِنَّةٍ ۚ إِنْ هُوَ إِلَّا نَذِيرٌۭ مُّبِينٌ
englishTranslationText:
Do	 they	not	ponder	 that	 their	companion	
is	far	removed	from	insanity?	In	fact	he	is	
clearly	a	Herald	of	Warning.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Kya	sochte	nahi	ke	unke	sāheb	ko	jonoon	
se	kuchh	alāqa	(T’alluq)	nahi	woh	to	sāf	dar	sunāne	wāle	haiñ

arabicText: أَوَلَمْ يَنظُرُوا۟ فِى مَلَكُوتِ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ وَمَا خَلَقَ ٱللَّهُ مِن شَىْءٍۢ وَأَنْ عَسَىٰٓ أَن يَكُونَ قَدِ ٱقْتَرَبَ أَجَلُهُمْ ۖ فَبِأَىِّ حَدِيثٍۭ بَعْدَهُۥ يُؤْمِنُونَ
englishTranslationText:
Have	they	not	pondered	deeply	regarding	
the	kingdom	of	the	heavens	and	the	earth,	and	whatever	things	Allah created?	And	that	possibly	
their	promise	(of	death)	may	have	come	near?	So	after	this	*,	in	what	will	they	believe?	(*Advent	
of	the	Last	Prophet	and	the	Holy	Qur’an.)
romanUrduTranslationText:
Kya	unhoñ	ne	nigāh	na	ki	āasmānon	aur	zameen	ki	saltanat	meiñ	aur	jo	jo	cheez	Allah	ne	banāyi	
aur	yeh	ke	shayad	unka	w’ada	nazdeek	āa	gaya	ho	to	iske	b’ad	aur	kaun	si	bāt	par	yaqeen	lāayeñ	
ge
